Player History
Injured on 6/17/1970 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Drafted in 7th round, 135th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1976...
Injured on 7/20/1978 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 6/5/1980 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/10/1984, off Derek Botelho (CHC)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 7/20/1984...
Hit first career homerun on 7/20/1985, off Britt Burns (CHC)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1985...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis on 4/6/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/1/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $970,000 per year...
Injured on 5/3/1992 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 8-9 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/8/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
